attributes.action: Bring Winnie-the-Pooh back home to the UK
attributes.additional_details:
The toys that inspired the books have lived in New York for about 70 years. That is too long for any Briton to be exiled from their country. It is high time the five friends came back to the land of the Hundred Acre Wood.

https://www.nypl.org/about/locations/schwarzman/childrens-center-42nd-street/pooh
attributes.background: Repatriate Pooh, Eeyore, Piglet, Kanga and Tigger from the New York Public Library.

rejection.details: These toys are privately owned, and not the responsibility of the UK Government or House of Commons.
